# Pull Requests Policy

Thank you for your interest!

This repository is published **as-is** under the GPL-3.0 license.

- Pull requests are **only accepted from collaborators** who have been explicitly added to this repository.
- Issues are disabled. Please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/emrikol/phpcs/discussions) for questions, ideas, and feedback.

If you are not a collaborator, please **fork this project** and continue development under the GPL.

---

> Non-collaborator pull requests will be automatically closed by a bot.
